languages.text: "Ооо, наша ледышка просто изводит себя от бешенства. Шепотки уже рассказали мне про пару его планов насчет Ирлиэт... только вот пока Лорд-капитан не разрешит — ничего он и не сделает".
"Ooh, our iceman is making himself sick with anger. My little whisperers have already told me about some of his plans for Yrliet... but he won't make his move without the Lord Captain's say-so."
languages.original_text: "Ооо, наша ледышка просто изводит себя от бешенства. Шепотки уже рассказали мне про пару его планов насчет Ирлиэт... только вот пока Лорд-капитан не разрешит — ничего он и не сделает".

traits.locale_text: "Ooh, our iceman is making himself sick with anger. My little whisperers have already told me about some of his plans for Yrliet... but he won't make his move without the Lord Captain's say-so."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ooh, our iceman is making himself sick with anger. My little whisperers have already told me about some of his plans for Yrliet... but he won't make his move without the Lord Captain's say-so."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “噢噢，我们的冰人儿都快要气疯了。我那些小小的低语者已经告诉了我，他打算怎么处置伊莉耶特……然而，若是没有舰长大人的许可，他是不会动手的。”
languages.original_text: "Ooh, our iceman is making himself sick with anger. My little whisperers have already told me about some of his plans for Yrliet... but he won't make his move without the Lord Captain's say-so."

traits.locale_text: “噢噢，我们的冰人儿都快要气疯了。我那些小小的低语者已经告诉了我，他打算怎么处置伊莉耶特……然而，若是没有舰长大人的许可，他是不会动手的。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ooh, notre rabat-joie se laisserait-il aller à la colère ? Mes petites voix m'ont déjà dit ce qu'il avait l'intention de faire d'Yrliet... mais il n'osera jamais passer à l'acte sans l'aval {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Ooh, our iceman is making himself sick with anger. My little whisperers have already told me about some of his plans for Yrliet... but he won't make his move without the Lord Captain's say-so."

traits.locale_text: « Ooh, notre rabat-joie se laisserait-il aller à la colère ? Mes petites voix m'ont déjà dit ce qu'il avait l'intention de faire d'Yrliet... mais il n'osera jamais passer à l'acte sans l'aval {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Uy, que al hombre de hielo le va a sentar mal el enfado. Mis pequeños susurros ya me han comentado algunos de sus planes para Yrliet... pero no hará nada sin permiso de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Ooh, our iceman is making himself sick with anger. My little whisperers have already told me about some of his plans for Yrliet... but he won't make his move without the Lord Captain's say-so."

traits.locale_text: «Uy, que al hombre de hielo le va a sentar mal el enfado. Mis pequeños susurros ya me han comentado algunos de sus planes para Yrliet... pero no hará nada sin permiso de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「へえ、われらが氷の君が怒りにさいなまれているなんて。私の小さな囁きは、あなたがユリエットをどうするつもりなのか、もう教えてくれてる…でも、ロード・キャプテンが指示しなければ動かないのね」
languages.original_text: "Ooh, our iceman is making himself sick with anger. My little whisperers have already told me about some of his plans for Yrliet... but he won't make his move without the Lord Captain's say-so."

traits.locale_text: 「へえ、われらが氷の君が怒りにさいなまれているなんて。私の小さな囁きは、あなたがユリエットをどうするつもりなのか、もう教えてくれてる…でも、ロード・キャプテンが指示しなければ動かないのね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ooh, unser Eismann wird ganz krank vor Zorn. Meine kleinen Flüsterer haben mir berichtet, was er mit Yrliet vorhat ... Aber er wird nichts unternommen, wenn der Lord Captain es ihm nicht gestattet."
languages.original_text: "Ooh, our iceman is making himself sick with anger. My little whisperers have already told me about some of his plans for Yrliet... but he won't make his move without the Lord Captain's say-so."

traits.locale_text: "Ooh, unser Eismann wird ganz krank vor Zorn. Meine kleinen Flüsterer haben mir berichtet, was er mit Yrliet vorhat ... Aber er wird nichts unternommen, wenn der Lord Captain es ihm nicht gestattet."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Ooh, our iceman is making himself sick with anger. My little whisperers have already told me about some of his plans for Yrliet... but he won't make his move without the Lord Captain's say-so."

languages.text: "Keskin sirke küpüne zarar demişler buz küpü. Minik fısıldayanlarım, Yrliet için planladıklarından bahsetti bana... Tabii Lord Kaptan'ın iznini almadan harekete geçmeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "Ooh, our iceman is making himself sick with anger. My little whisperers have already told me about some of his plans for Yrliet... but he won't make his move without the Lord Captain's say-so."

traits.locale_text: "Keskin sirke küpüne zarar demişler buz küpü. Minik fısıldayanlarım, Yrliet için planladıklarından bahsetti bana... Tabii Lord Kaptan'ın iznini almadan harekete geçmeyeceksin."
